Description: Processed data files based on Spatial Transcriptomics RNA-seq Level 2 and Spatial Transcriptomics Auxiliary files.
DependsOn: Component,VisiumRNALevel3_id,Filename,File Format,Biospecimen Key,VisiumRNALevel2 Key,VisiumAux Key,File Alias,Run ID,Visium File Type,Workflow Version,Workflow Link,Capture Area,Spots under tissue,Mean Reads per Spatial Spot,Median Number Genes per Spatial Spot,Sequencing Saturation,Proportion Reads Mapped,Proportion Reads Mapped to Transcriptome,Median UMI Counts per Spot

Description: Unique row identifier, used as a primary key for record updates
The file type generated for the visium experiment.
Valid Values: reference png, reference jpg, json scale factors, probe dataset csv, qc result html, filtered mex, unfiltered mex, tissue_positions, barcodes, features, fiducial image png, fiducial image jpg, detected image png, detected jpg, high res image, low res image, json scale factors, probe dataset csv

Description: The number of barcodes associated with a spot under tissue.
The number of reads, both under and outside of tissue, divided by the number of barcodes associated with a spot under tissue.

Attribute: Median Number Genes per Spatial Spot
Description: The median number of genes detected per spot under tissue-associated barcode. Detection is defined as the presence of at least 1 UMI count.
Proportion of mapped reads collected from samtools. Number
Fraction of reads that mapped to a unique gene in the transcriptome. The read must be consistent with annotated splice junctions. These reads are considered for UMI counting.
The median number of UMI counts per tissue covered spot.
